alert.note: Alert for Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 09 at 5:21AM PST until March 09 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 2500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Southern Trinity County. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
